actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution urging referral of the issue of sovereignty over the Falkland (Malvinas) Islands to the International Court of Justice.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should: (1) seek agreement by Argentina and Great Britain to submit the issue of sovereignty over the Falkland Islands to the International Court of Justice; or (2) if such agreement is not obtained, direct the Permanent Representative of the United States to the United Nations to urge the Security Council to request the International Court of Justice to render an advisory opinion on the issue of sovereignty.

titles.title: A resolution urging referral of the issue of sovereignty over the Falkland (Malvinas) Islands to the International Court of Justice.
